newHeroSection.title: EGYPTIAN ARCHAEOLOGICAL HERITAGE
newHeroSection.description: Discover major and minor archaeological sites across different historical periods. From prehistoric settlements to Islamic monuments, explore Egypt's rich cultural heritage spanning over 5,000 years.

historicalEras.title: Historical Eras of Egypt
historicalEras.subtitle: JOURNEY THROUGH TIME
historicalEras.description: Explore Egypt's rich history spanning over 5,000 years. From the age of pharaohs to Islamic civilization, discover the diverse cultures and dynasties that shaped this ancient land.

booksSection.title: Explore Our Book Collection
booksSection.description: Curated scholarly works on Ancient Egyptian archaeology, history, and culture. Perfect for students, researchers, and enthusiasts.
booksSection.discoverDescription: From beginner guides to advanced archaeological studies, find the perfect book to deepen your knowledge of Ancient Egypt.
